data.name: Night Out
data.detailed_description:
Looks like your have a Date to go to! Excited? You should be! Your going to the top restaurants in the world (Top secured that is). Play with 1-4 people online as you rush to your table to have the best Night Out! Solve Puzzles, do parkour, work together and GET TO YOUR TABLE!

Originally created as a relationship game, we still believe that Night Out isn't just only fun but can also fix cracks in friendships and relationships...To create a better foundation for your friendships...relationships...and courtships. Created by DevLight Studios we will push towards our goal in creating something fun, challenging and communication driven.



Night Out is a cooperative online platformer puzzle game for 1-4 players (Currently only 1-2 CO-OP)
Only one thing is important...FIND YOUR TABLE! With tons of Levels (And more to come each season) we bring to you special, fun gimmicks, and challenging levels! You will have to communicate with your peers in order to successfully get to your table and have a wonderful Night Out.
  • Win by both team mates reaching the table
  • Work together! Its all or nothing
  • Levels built for fun and help communication skills
We plan on releasing gamemodes such as a 2V2 mode and a 4 Player CO-OP later in our games release...


No WIFI? Wanna just play solo? Well your in luck! Night Out also has single player mode for offline fun! With Tons of Levels (And more to come each season) we bring to you levels in which will force you to have precise parkour skills and use your brain. Solo mode is a great way to grind on skill, XP, and cash!
  • Levels built for a one man job
  • Grind TIPS to use in the shop
  • Play Offline...wherever,whenever!
  • Complete the level with a 3 Star!

Features

  • Customization: Color, Hat, Pet
  • Cross-platform play between PC, Android, and iOS
  • Quickly find a game online from the host list
  • Different ways to play
  • Daily Shop System
  • New Challenge Level with changes overtime
  • VIP Pass

data.short_description: Night Out is a cooperative online multiplayer action puzzle platformer for 1-4 players. With both a online mode and solo mode, this game will deliver smiles and laughs...
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
